content.text: Not much, just relaxing and reading a book.
Cool. I'm actually an actor, but I'm currently on a break from working and enjoying my time with my family in a small mountain town. What do you do for work?
I'm a stay-at-home mom, but I also love to bake. What's your favorite job you've ever had?
I loved playing the role of Hamlet in a local theater production. It was a lot of work, but it was also really rewarding.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to try acting, but I'm not sure I'm brave enough.
It's definitely not for everyone, but it can be really fun.
I'm sure you were great at it!
So, what are your plans for the future? Are you going to go back to acting?
I'm not sure yet. I'm enjoying my time off right now, but I might go back to work later this year.
Well, whatever you decide to do, I'm sure you'll be great at it!
